items.summary: Make Version 18 the active codebase by fully reverting both frontend and backend behavior to the Version 18 consistency tracker (Habits UI) referenced in this conversation, removing/rolling back any Version 19â€“23 changes that could be causing deployment/publish to fall back to a newer version and blocking release.

Ensure the reverted Version 18 backend runs safely on the existing canister state by adding/maintaining Motoko upgrade migration logic that can read any newer stored stable state and convert it into a Version 18-compatible stable state without data loss for Version 18 entities (user profiles, habits, records, monthly targets).

Add a regression-safe startup path so the UI never renders a blank white screen on initial load: ensure all required data is null-safe during initial render and that any fatal rendering errors are caught and presented via the existing error boundary fallback UI instead of a blank screen.
